sentence: Feb 11 (Reuters) - When Idaho nurse Joan West received a fundraising mailer from U.S. Representative Liz Cheney, she saw a way to address her regret for having voted for Donald Trump in 2016 and her worry about the future of U.S. democracy: She wrote a $500 check.
author: Nathan Layne
title: Surge of out-of-state donors boost Trump critic Cheney's campaign -but cannot vote for her
